abstract: Never mind Facebook; the Winklevoss twins rule in digital money. | An ex-KPMG partner is charged in insider case. | Seeking relief, banks are shift risk to murkier corners. | Ex-regulators are finding a home with a powerful firm. | A solution for Penney may be to sell itself, or some of its assets. | A battle is heating up over the fate of a troubled energy buyout.

headline.main: Week in Review: From Banes of Zuckerberg to Bitcoin Moguls
